targets.expr:
sum(
    camel_routes_running_routes{
        job=~"$job",
        cluster="$cluster",
        namespace="$namespace",
        camelContext="$context",
        app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$part_of",
        app_kubernetes_io_name="$app_name",
        app_kubernetes_io_component="$component",
        app_kubernetes_io_instance="$instance",
        app_kubernetes_io_version="$version"
    }
) 
/ 
sum(
    camel_routes_added_routes{
        job=~"$job",
        cluster="$cluster",
        namespace="$namespace",
        camelContext="$context",
        app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$part_of",
        app_kubernetes_io_name="$app_name",
        app_kubernetes_io_component="$component",
        app_kubernetes_io_instance="$instance",
        app_kubernetes_io_version="$version"
    }
)
*
100

panels.description: Shows completed exchanges of the camel context in the time range
panels.title: Completed

targets.expr:
sum by (pod) (
    jvm_memory_used_bytes{
        job=~"$job",
        cluster="$cluster",
        namespace="$namespace",
        app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$part_of",
        app_kubernetes_io_name="$app_name",
        app_kubernetes_io_component="$component",
        app_kubernetes_io_instance="$instance",
        app_kubernetes_io_version="$version",
        area="heap"
    }
) 
/ 
sum by (pod) (
    jvm_memory_max_bytes{
        job=~"$job",
        cluster="$cluster",
        namespace="$namespace",
        app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$part_of",
        app_kubernetes_io_name="$app_name",
        app_kubernetes_io_component="$component",
        app_kubernetes_io_instance="$instance",
        app_kubernetes_io_version="$version",
        area="heap"
    }
)

sum by (pod) (
    jvm_memory_used_bytes{
        job=~"$job",
        cluster="$cluster",
        namespace="$namespace",
        app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$part_of",
        app_kubernetes_io_name="$app_name",
        app_kubernetes_io_component="$component",
        app_kubernetes_io_instance="$instance",
        app_kubernetes_io_version="$version",
        area="nonheap"
    }
) 
/ 
sum by (pod) (
    jvm_memory_max_bytes{
        job=~"$job",
        cluster="$cluster",
        namespace="$namespace",
        app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$part_of",
        app_kubernetes_io_name="$app_name",
        app_kubernetes_io_component="$component",
        app_kubernetes_io_instance="$instance",
        app_kubernetes_io_version="$version",
        area="nonheap"
    }
)

panels.title: Pods per Nodes and CPU Usage

panels.description: Show the numbers of exchanges per second for camel route $route
panels.title: Ex/sec

targets.expr:
sum by (camelContext) (
    camel_exchanges_inflight{
        job=~"$job",
        cluster="$cluster",
        namespace="$namespace",
        camelContext="$context",
        app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$part_of",
        app_kubernetes_io_name="$app_name",
        app_kubernetes_io_component="$component",
        app_kubernetes_io_instance="$instance", 
        app_kubernetes_io_version="$version",
        routeId=~"$route"
    }
)
sum by (kubernetes_pod_name) (camel_exchanges_inflight{job=~"$job",namespace="$namespace",camelContext="$context",routeId=~"$route"})

panels.description: Average execution time for a route
panels.title: Avg Exec time $route

targets.expr:
sum by (routeId,nodeId) (
    increase (
        camel_message_history_seconds_sum{
            job=~"$job",
            cluster="$cluster",
            namespace="$namespace",
            camelContext="$context",
            app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$part_of",
            app_kubernetes_io_name="$app_name",
            app_kubernetes_io_component="$component",
            app_kubernetes_io_instance="$instance", 
            app_kubernetes_io_version="$version",
            routeId=~"$route",
            nodeId=~"$processor"
        }[$__range]
    )
) 
/ 
sum by (routeId,nodeId) (
    increase (
        camel_message_history_seconds_count{
            job=~"$job",
            cluster="$cluster",
            namespace="$namespace",
            camelContext="$context",
            app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$part_of",
            app_kubernetes_io_name="$app_name",
            app_kubernetes_io_component="$component",
            app_kubernetes_io_instance="$instance", 
            app_kubernetes_io_version="$version",
            routeId=~"$route",
            nodeId=~"$processor"
        }[$__range]
    )
)
